Threat Description: Attackers can manipulate data in RabbitMQ due to improper access controls or vulnerabilities in the application using the database.
Countermeasure: Implement proper access controls and encryption for sensitive data, and regularly review and update RabbitMQ configurations and plugins to ensure they are up-to-date and secure.
ASVS Reference: OWASP Application Security Verification Standard (ASVS) - Data Validation and Encryption
CIS Reference: Center for Internet Security (CIS), RabbitMQ Security Best Practices
MITRE Tactics Description: Attackers can manipulate or alter data in transit, potentially leading to unauthorized access or changes to sensitive information.
MITRE Techniques Description: Attackers can use data encoding techniques to obfuscate malicious data or commands, making it more difficult to detect and prevent attacks.
